extendedInfo.description: FreeCell - one of the top solitaires in the world - now on your phone or tablet. With three difficulty levels, clear and nice cards that are readable even on small phone screens and look awesome on HD tablets, infinite undo, score and automatic save make it one of the greatest solitaires in Android Market.Rules- Build foundations from Ace to King (top right corner),- You can move more than one card only when you have free cells,- Within the tableau, cards are built down in sequence and alternating in color.Features- Three difficulty levels: medium is classic version with four free cells, easy has 5 free cells and hard only 3,- Infinite UNDO,- State is saved and restarted automatically, so you don't have to worry that something will interrupt your game,- You can restart the same game to try to beat it.- Timer.Try also our Klondike Solitaire HD and Spider Solitaire HD (completely new version of the latter coming soon!).

reviews.title: FreeCell Solitaire HD
reviews.comment: Ok game. Doesn\'t seem to want to move cards very easily. Dragging them requires patience. Also, it doesn\'t seem to correctly calculate the number of cards that can be moved, based on open columns.
reviews.author: Tony Wilson

reviews.title: Frecell,
reviews.comment: This is terrible, the game is very sensitive to which card u pick up. It does not assume that u need to use spare card slots to move stacks and on some occasions it would not let me use all slots.
reviews.author: Keith naismith

reviews.comment: And I\'m a portrait fan.

reviews.title: Superb support from Tomasz
reviews.comment: I have several Magory solitaire games. All good to play - great graphics and different levels. Support emails replied to within the hour! Great service. THANKS.

reviews.title: Appalled
reviews.comment: I loaded this for my 9 yo  son to play on my cell. I unloaded b/ can ad  appeared for \"girls\" at bottom of screen. Get a date....enjoy..,etc.   Why don\'t u sensor these games for kids.  I want to report u but I don\'t know where to do it.
